name: Delivering a world-class customer support experience
description:
Today, providing great customer support isn’t optional. If you’ve mastered providing great support to customers with Intercom it’s time to get official recognition for your art.

The 'Deliver a world-class customer support experience' course examines a Support agent's knowledge around using the Intercom Inbox to resolve customer conversations and collaborate with their team.

Recipients of this certificate have demonstrated their knowledge in:
✔ Managing conversation states.
✔ Resolving conversations effectively.
✔ Working collaboratively and efficiently.
✔ Understanding a conversation journey.
